website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 790 v6 is a neutral road running that comes off as a more refined version of its predecessor. Because of the revamps made, the shoe performs better, but is more lightweight. The improvements make this an affordable choice to consider when looking for a faithful companion for daily wear, light exercises, and running.
pros: Most users commented that the New Balance 790 v6 felt very comfortable
One user highlighted that she has high arches and hammer toes, but the shoe still came through in terms of comfort
A majority of testers praised the unfussy style and the apparently appealing colorways
The New Balance 790 v6 is extremely light, said a few reviewers
They preferred this weight because it enabled them to run faster
Several users observed that the shoe was well ventilated
Because of its minimalist style, users generally used the shoe for casual and exercising purposes
One user was able to run 30 miles with the shoe without experiencing any pains or soreness on his legs and feet
Some of the testers felt that the shoe offered great value for its quality
cons: Several users complained that the shoe was too small or narrow
Some testers commented on the cushioning of the New Balance 790 v6
They said that it wasn’t very comfortable
One reviewer was displeased with the inserts that came with the shoe
He said that they felt cheaply made
The shoe laces were a common concern for a lot of users
Many said that they were not of good quality and were too short

customer_reviews.title: new balance for nurses
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to buy a size up as many had stated. So instead of buying an 11 I bought a 12 and they fit great!!!
customer_reviews.author: cem

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LOOK OF THESE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE LOOK OF THESE. They are comfy as well but my goodness their sizing has changed. My old new balance shoes were a 6 so I ordered a 6.5 in these but they are still snug. I am hoping they will stretch out a bit after wearing them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: RM88

customer_reviews.title: At least 1.5 sizes to small!  Order UP!
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 7.5, but in New Balance that translates to 8.5. I ordered an 8.5 and had to double check these were the correct size when they arrived. They were waaaaaay too small. These in 8.5 easily fit my teen daughter who is normally a 7 in New Balance shoes. So instead of returning them I passed them on to my teen! Great support and they still look good a month or two later. I love New Balance but be mindful of the size on these ones!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I bought them in a 9 wide which is a difficult size to find. I love them because I get so many compliments on the color, they are extremely comfortable and they make a big feet look smaller. I wish I could purchase them again. It seems they are not available in my size now.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Greene

customer_reviews.title: It feels as if 8 1/2 would have worked better. Measured heel to toe
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing New Balance shoes for a while. My last one was 680v3, size 8B. I ordered this one too in the same size, but it feels somewhat smaller. My toes are almost touching the front of the shoe. It feels as if 8 1/2 would have worked better. Measured heel to toe, the 790v6 is slightly smaller than my 680v3 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: walker

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and fit! I like having a running shoe that has some support but not too much/ is light weight. I have ran 10ks and 1/2 marathons in these. If you need lots of support, these probably aren’t for you. They do have some support but not like ASICS.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe for my daughter for walking to school and ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe for my daughter for walking to school and daily PE. I find they never last that long. After 3-4 months the bottom is worn and parts are unravelling.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. The color is really just what I wanted but the fir is a little tighter than I like. I wear a 7 and have bought New Balance many times and this is the first of their shoes with which I have had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes and pretty comfortable. I know it's not specifically a training ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes and pretty comfortable. I know it's not specifically a training shoes but I do wear them to my endurance training class and when I do squats, it feels a bit slippery on the bottom. I still wear it and it doesn't bother me too much. Otherwise, good deal and price too.
customer_reviews.author: LRogers

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant because of the price, but such a great shoe! You will need a high-quality insert if you plan to run in these, though.
customer_reviews.author: Katie J

customer_reviews.title: Go one size bigger :-)
customer_reviews.text: So happy I read the reviews before buying, which prompted me to buy 1 size bigger. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So that is a bit of a disappointment as well
customer_reviews.text: These seem to run short. I have other New Balance sneakers in 10.5 that fit well. I think I might need to exchange these for an 11. I bought the color "Outer Space/Guava" which online looked to be a charcoal grey, but they are blue. So that is a bit of a disappointment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit was too small. Sole was harder, more plastic feel than was expected. Shoes were returned.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaRNmommy

customer_reviews.title: recommend ordering half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them a little big due to reading some of the previous reviews and they are super comfortable there a half size bigger than I usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Listen to everyone when they say they are too small .. I should have listened 😓
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have challenging feet. High arches and hammer toe. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Darby

customer_reviews.title: Not enough room for toes.
customer_reviews.text: Returned because very tight in the toe area. I will be sticking with the new balance 711.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are narrower than usual and overall smaller. Additionally, the shoe laces are short.
customer_reviews.author: Celtics 20

customer_reviews.title: They were good shoes somewhat
customer_reviews.text: They were good shoes somewhat ...but I walk all day at work and am on my feet for 8 to 12 hours and my feet were killing me before the day was over .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.jordan❤️

customer_reviews.title: The shoes were DIRTY AND USED
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were DIRTY AND USED!!!!! I bought NEW SHOES that had been worn QUITE a bit to the point the inside was dirty as well as the outside, YUCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn D Hardley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality plain running shoes that aren’t $100
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and wanted. Good quality plain running shoes that aren’t $100!
customer_reviews.author: CjKatz

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. However they're not as cushioned as my last pair of NB's. Still comfy though, I wear them for work.
customer_reviews.author: LuvCat

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoe but did think the bottoms were a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe but did think the bottoms were a little thin for this to be a running shoe. This does not have enough support for me to run in Great Shoe for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Castro

customer_reviews.title: not great support and already wearing out
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok...not great support and already wearing out ...I'll look for another brand next time...not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ksl

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes with more support than most others shoe brands ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes with more support than most others shoe brands on the market. This is the second pair I have purchased of these and I will continue on with them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace an older version of this same sneak and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: James Charles

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new balance shoes! So comfortable. Very pleased and came in the mail fast. Would highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: SJlane35

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed new shoes at a low price. Just what I got.
customer_reviews.author: jamie francis

customer_reviews.title: Not New Balance quality!
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly the quality that I expected from New Balance. There is very little cushion and/or support in the foot of the shoe. Even the shoestrings are poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, decent quality. Only negative is minimal arch support.
customer_reviews.author: MLR5

customer_reviews.title: They are long enough, but tight in the toes ...
customer_reviews.text: They are long enough, but tight in the toes, which surprised me. Because all the other New Balance shoes I own (6 or 7 pairs) for me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are incredibly comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly comfortable and attractive. I have plantar fasciitis so walking is a struggle. Since I purchased these, I have been able to run on tread mill with zero pain
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for the price! I ordered the black version and they are good looking, with the hot pink being pretty subtle. Another plus is that they are actually small looking for the size (I wear size 12s), which is always a plus. The main drawback is that I'd like to have more arch support and overall cushioning in the shoes, but they are adequate and don't cause me any discomfort. I bought 2 pair because of the price, and don't regret it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as you see it in this picture but cuter :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Russ

customer_reviews.title: By far one of my favorite shoes for cardio and fitness classes
customer_reviews.text: I have already bought two pairs of these! By far one of my favorite shoes for cardio and fitness classes.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ... buy up a size but they fit my daughter great and she loves
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy up a size but they fit my daughter great and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Aerin

customer_reviews.title: An excellent running/athletic shoe and a great price but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9, which is a half-size larger than my usual 8 1/2 athletic shoe. I read the comments stating that these shoes run small, so I took the chance and ordered a larger size. Luckily, this size fits me perfectly and the shoes are very comfortable. You can't beat the price offered by Amazon! I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! So comfortable and they have amazing support! I will be buying new balance sneakers from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: ... new balance shoes and these ones have been my favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: My doctor has perscibed new balance shoes and these ones have been my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: aybesee123

customer_reviews.title: ... comfy and the purple color is very vibrant and pretty! I'm always a 9
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little big but they are very comfy and the purple color is very vibrant and pretty! I'm always a 9.5 in NB, the 9.5 fits but is a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Allie C.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: They are better than the last NB shoe I bought
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand. These are very comfortable and I like ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand. These are very comfortable and I like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Karla W

customer_reviews.title: Even though the shoe is long enough and super cushiony, it just feels too wide (it LOOKS ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9B in athletic shoes, but I read the reviews and thankfully ordered the 9.5B. Even though the shoe is long enough and super cushiony, it just feels too wide (it LOOKS wide too, making my feet look ridiculous). I have 3 daughters, so midpoint they will fit one of them they just did not work for me. But I definitely agree that they run a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Texas mom

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister and she adores them.
customer_reviews.author: JandTmama

customer_reviews.title: Roomy toes, comfy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the New Balance 790v6. I bought my first pair about eight months ago for a month-long vacation overseas that included a great deal of walking. They survived that, a trip to Disney World, and being my main walking/gym/workout shoes for months. I like them so much that I bought this pair as a backup. They work for my wide toes, and have enough cushion to keep me on my feet all day. I like that their main color is black - it doesn't show dirt, and blends in decently in city travel.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they fit so good & very light shoe, love em
customer_reviews.author: Toni Weckherlin

customer_reviews.title: Fits to small
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this shoe is it runs TOO SMALL! I shouldve listened to everyone else and ordered up. My big toe is practically at the tip of the shoe. Im hoping it stretches out as well but doubt it. I want to return it for a bigger size but dont want to go through hassel but I may
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purple running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love new balance running shoes overall and these have a great fit for a flat-footed gal like me. The color is just beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Not as much cushioning as I Like and expect from New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Not as much cushioning as I Like and expect from New Balance. However, shoes are comfortable and provided enough support for aerobics. Purchased a size larger and wider than usual.
customer_reviews.author: RONAA

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the spectral/gem color and they are very stylish and pretty. Went grocery shopping in them and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I could tell the moment I put them on that they would be very comfy. I ordered the spectral/gem color and they are very stylish and pretty. Went grocery shopping in them and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect New Balance
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES these! They fit perfectly, feel great, and are way cuter in person than in the pic. I definitely recommend them!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well fit and these arrive faster. The only thing is those look kind of simple...

customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 8 in NB. Fit great, very comfy for walking or jogging.

customer_reviews.text: I'm going to reorder and I Gabe these as a gift cause didn't fit ne.

customer_reviews.text: Kind of small wish they had a 10. I thought the 9.5 would fit.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for running!!! Good support lots of toe room!

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is nice and I received it in good time
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is nice and I received it in good time, but does not fit properly, so I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size is smaller than the actual size
customer_reviews.text: The size is too small than the actual size,I have to return it. Color and design are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are light, which I wanted, but they run short and in the end I simply could not wear them.
customer_reviews.author: ACW

customer_reviews.title: MOST uncomfortable NEW BALANCES to date!
customer_reviews.text: I love NB usually! I'm so disappointed with these running shoes! I am a very active person and working out is part of my daily routine. These felt too tight and too small even with the wider with! Add to that, that there is little to know support-they must go back! New Balance is known for comfort and these are missing the mark. I would have loved to keep these as they look great, love the style and color combo. Amazon had these on my doorstep within 2 days of ordering during the holiday season WITHOUT purchasing expedited shipping. Great service per usual with Amazon, unfortunate these will need to be exchanged!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes and have always been a fan of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes and have always been a fan of New Balance
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

product_meta.title: New Balance W790v6 Running Shoe-w, Women’s W790v6 Running Shoe-w
product_meta.description: With intelligent styling, lightweight handling, and exceptional underfoot feel, this modern design is sure to inspire the athlete within to pick up the pace.
feature_bullets: Ground contact EVA outsole with rubber pods
